title: CI/CD Pipeline to AWS EKS
description: Built a complete CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, including build (Maven), security scanning (Trivy, GitLeaks), testing (SonarQube), and deployment to EKS using Terraform and kubectl. Implemented secure GitHub Secrets management and custom kubeconfig setup.

title: Cloud Database Migration
description: Successfully migrated MySQL database from EC2 to Amazon RDS using AWS CLI and Bash scripting. Configured VPC architecture, security groups, and custom parameter groups while ensuring zero data loss during migration.

title: GCP Metrics Collection System
description: Implemented a comprehensive monitoring solution for GKE workloads using Managed Prometheus and node_exporter. Created custom PromQL queries and Grafana dashboards for real-time metrics visualization.
